mapper.insert: INSERT INTO review(user_id, order_category_id, alter_id, category_id, content, score) VALUES(#{userId}, #{orderCategoryId}, #{alterId}, #{categoryId}, #{content}, #{score})
mapper.update: UPDATE alterations SET avg_score = (SELECT AVG(score) FROM review WHERE alter_id = #{alterId}) WHERE id = #{alterId};
mapper.select: SELECT r.id, r.user_id, r.order_category_id, r.alter_id, c.name as categoryName, r.content, r.score, r.create_date from review r join category c on r.category_id = c.id WHERE r.alter_id = #{alterId} AND r.enable =1 ORDER BY r.create_date DESC
